data.comment: Today's referee, Alex Chilowicz, has blown to start the match.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Alex Chilowicz awards the home team a throw-in.
New York have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
New York attack but Aaron Long's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 3, Goal kick for Miami at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Can Miami get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York's half?
New York awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 6, Ball safe as New York is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in New York.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
In the minute 8, Miami to take a throw-in in New York territory.
Throw-in for New York in the half of Miami.
Throw-in for Miami in their own half.
In the minute 10, New York are coming forward and Mathias Jorgensen gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fort Lauderdale.
Alex Chilowicz signals a Miami throw-in in New York's half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for New York at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Throw-in Miami.
Throw-in for New York in their own half.
In the minute 14, New York have been awarded a penalty in Fort Lauderdale...
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead thanks to a penalty from Mandela Egbo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 16, Ball goes out of play for a New York goal kick.
Miami have a goal kick.
Miami to take a throw-in in New York territory.
In the minute 18, In Fort Lauderdale, Miami push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Miami's Juan Agudelo has run offside.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New York.
In the minute 20, Miami's Matias Pellegrini misses with an attempt on goal.
Alex Chilowicz awards New York a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fort Lauderdale.
In the minute 21, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Miami.
Leandro Gonzalez Pirez (Miami) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 23, Goal kick for New York at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Miami's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Miami in Fort Lauderdale.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Miami.
Throw-in for Miami close to the penalty box.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Miami in the half of New York.
In Fort Lauderdale a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Miami.
In the minute 32, Miami's Juan Agudelo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Alex Chilowicz awards New York a goal kick.
New York awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, New York awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Miami is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Alex Chilowicz awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for New York at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Throw-in for New York in their own half.
Mathias Jorgensen for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 39, Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Juan Agudelo.
Great play from Matias Pellegrini to set up the goal.
Throw-in for New York in the half of Miami.
In the minute 41, Alex Chilowicz signals a New York throw-in in Miami's half.
New York awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for New York in their own half.
In the minute 44, Miami will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from New York.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Ball goes out of play for a Miami goal kick.
Alex Chilowicz signals a New York throw-in in Miami's half.
Throw-in Miami.
In the minute 47, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
Juan Agudelo for Miami is whistled offside.
Brian White scores to make it 1-2 at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
In the minute 49, Omir Fernandez instrumental with a fine assist.
New York have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Alex Chilowicz signals a throw-in for New York, close to Miami's area.
In the minute 52, Miami's Juan Agudelo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a New York defender.
In Fort Lauderdale a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Miami have a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Miami's half?
In the minute 56, Throw-in for New York at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Free kick for New York in the half of Miami.
Chris Armas is making the team's first substitution at Inter Miami CF Stadium with Cristian Casseres Jr replacing Dru Yearwood.
New York make their second substitution with Ben Mines replacing Omir Fernandez.
Throw-in for New York in the half of Miami.
In the minute 57, The home team replace Matias Pellegrini with Robbie Robinson.
Ball safe as Miami is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rodolfo Pizarro is on a sub for Victor Ulloa for Miami.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Miami in their own half.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New York.
Miami to take a throw-in in New York territory.
In the minute 62, Leandro Gonzalez Pirez (Miami) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for New York close to the penalty box.
Miami's Rodolfo Pizarro has been booked in Fort Lauderdale.
In the minute 65, The home team have replaced Dylan Nealis with Jay Chapman. This is the third substitution made today by Diego Alonso.
Miami pushes forward through Rodolfo Pizarro, whose finish on goal is saved.
Miami have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 69, New York needs to be cautious. Miami have an attacking throw-in.
Miami are pushing forward but Brek Shea's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fort Lauderdale.
In the minute 70, Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
Free kick Miami.
In the minute 74, Tom Barlow is replacing Mathias Jorgensen for the away team.
Chris Armas (New York) is making a third substitution, with Daniel Royer replacing Florian Valot.
In Fort Lauderdale Miami attack through Lewis Morgan. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 76, Goal kick for New York at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
In the minute 79, Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kyle Duncan is replacing Brian White for New York at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Free kick for New York in their own half.
Alex Chilowicz awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 83, Ball safe as New York is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tom Barlow (New York) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
In the minute 83, At Inter Miami CF Stadium, New York are penalized for being offside.
Ball goes out of play for a New York goal kick.
Ben Mines puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 1-3.
In the minute 85, Kyle Duncan with an assist there.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Miami.
In the minute 88, Brek Shea (Miami) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
New York to take a throw-in in Miami territory.
Throw-in for Miami in the half of New York.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Alex Chilowicz awards the away team a throw-in.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Fort Lauderdale. The final score is 1-4.
It's now 1-4 in Fort Lauderdale as Daniel Royer scores for New York.
That's a fine assist from Cristian Casseres Jr.
